description: This dataset provides volume of loaded freight rail cars transported between NY and NJ by New York New Jersey Rail, a carfloat operation owned by the Port Authority of NY & NJ. Total volume, including empty cars, is estimated at twice the volume of loaded.  2013 entry is year-to-date volume at this time

metadata.attribution: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey

name: Freight Cars Moved in Carfloat Operations, Port Authority of NY NJ:  Beginning 2009
